thread.title: Boutique hotel - Our lovely home in Paris
thread.title_full: Boutique hotel - Our lovely home in Paris - Review of Hotel Le Walt, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Susan C
title: Boutique hotel - Our lovely home in Paris
text:
We loved staying at this beautiful, small boutique hotel in a wonderful neighborhood. The hotel staff are lovely, the rooms are elegant and extremely comfortable. The linens are luxurious, rooms spacious, nice seating, everything was perfect. We could walk to many places and the Metro was literally right out the door. There are great restaurants within minutes of the hotel, and even a little chocolate shop, patisserie, and take-out lunch place with soup and sandwiches. We will definitely return next time we are in Paris. Merci beaucoup!
